verses.verse: Now <S%G1161><s%> in <S%G1909><s%> the things which we are saying, <S%G3004><s%> the main point <S%G2774><s%> is this. <S%G2192><s%> We have such <S%G5108><s%> a high priest, <S%G749><s%> who <S%G3739><s%> sat <S%G2523><s%> down on <S%G1722><s%> the right hand <S%G1188><s%> of the throne <S%G2362><s%> of the Majesty <S%G3172><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the heavens, <S%G3772><s%>

a servant <S%G3011><s%> of the sanctuary, <S%G39><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> of the <S%G4633><s%> true <S%G228><s%> tabernacle, <S%G4633><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> the Lord <S%G2962><s%> pitched, <S%G4078><s%> <S%G2532><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> man. <S%G444><s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> every <S%G3956><s%> high priest <S%G749><s%> is appointed <S%G2525><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> offer <S%G4374><s%> both <S%G5037><s%> gifts <S%G1435><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> sacrifices. <S%G2378><s%> Therefore <S%G3606><s%> it is necessary <S%G316><s%> that <S%G3739><s%> this high priest <S%G5126><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> have <S%G2192><s%> something <S%G5100><s%> to offer. <S%G4374><s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> if <S%G1487><s%> <S%G99999><s%> he were <S%G2258><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> earth, <S%G1093><s%> he would <S%G2258><s%> not <S%G3761><s%> <S%G99999><s%> be <S%G2258><s%> a priest <S%G2409><s%> at all, <S%G5607><s%> seeing there are priests <S%G2409><s%> who offer <S%G4374><s%> the gifts <S%G1435><s%> according <S%G2596><s%> to the law; <S%G3551><s%>

who <S%G3748><s%> serve <S%G3000><s%> a copy <S%G5262><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> shadow <S%G4639><s%> of the heavenly things, <S%G2032><s%> even as <S%G2531><s%> Moses <S%G3475><s%> was warned by God <S%G5537><s%> when he was about <S%G3195><s%> to make <S%G2005><s%> the tabernacle, <S%G4633><s%> for <S%G1063><s%> he <S%G5346><s%> said, <S%G3708><s%> "See, you shall make <S%G4160><s%> everything <S%G3956><s%> according to <S%G2596><s%> the pattern <S%G5179><s%> that was shown <S%G1166><s%> to you <S%G4671><s%> on <S%G1722><s%> the mountain. <S%G3735><s%>"

But <S%G1161><s%> now <S%G3570><s%> he has obtained a <S%G5177><s%> more excellent <S%G1313><s%> ministry, <S%G3009><s%> by so much <S%G3745><s%> as <S%G5177><s%> he is <S%G2076><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> the mediator <S%G3316><s%> of a better <S%G2909><s%> covenant, <S%G1242><s%> which <S%G3748><s%> on better <S%G2909><s%> promises <S%G1860><s%> has been given as law. <S%G3549><s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> if <S%G1487><s%> that <S%G1565><s%> first <S%G4413><s%> covenant had been <S%G2258><s%> faultless, <S%G273><s%> then no <S%G3756><s%> <S%G99999><s%> place <S%G5117><s%> would have been sought <S%G2212><s%> for a second. <S%G1208><s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> finding fault <S%G3201><s%> with them, <S%G846><s%> he said, <S%G3004><s%> "Behold, <S%G2400><s%> the days <S%G2250><s%> come, <S%G2064><s%>" says <S%G3004><s%> the Lord, <S%G2962><s%> "that <S%G2532><s%> I will make <S%G4931><s%> a <S%G1242><s%> new <S%G2537><s%> covenant <S%G1242><s%> with <S%G1909><s%> the house <S%G3624><s%> of Israel <S%G2474><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> with <S%G1909><s%> the house <S%G3624><s%> of Judah; <S%G2448><s%>

not <S%G3756><s%> according to <S%G2596><s%> the covenant <S%G1242><s%> that <S%G3739><s%> I made <S%G4160><s%> with <S%G3962><s%> their <S%G846><s%> fathers, <S%G3962><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the day <S%G2250><s%> that <S%G3739><s%> I <S%G3450><s%> took <S%G1949><s%> them <S%G846><s%> by the hand <S%G5495><s%> to lead <S%G1806><s%> them <S%G846><s%> out <S%G1806><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> the land <S%G1093><s%> of Egypt; <S%G125><s%> for <S%G3754><s%> they <S%G846><s%> didn't <S%G3756><s%> continue <S%G1696><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> covenant, <S%G1242><s%> and I <S%G2504><s%> disregarded <S%G272><s%> <S%G272><s%> them, <S%G846><s%>" says <S%G3004><s%> the Lord. <S%G2962><s%>

"For <S%G3754><s%> this <S%G3778><s%> is the covenant <S%G1242><s%> that <S%G3739><s%> I will make <S%G1303><s%> with the house <S%G3624><s%> of Israel. <S%G2474><s%> After <S%G3326><s%> those <S%G1565><s%> days, <S%G2250><s%>" says <S%G3004><s%> the Lord; <S%G2962><s%> "I will <S%G1924><s%> put <S%G1325><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> laws <S%G3551><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> their <S%G846><s%> mind, <S%G1271><s%> <S%G2532><s%> I will also write <S%G1924><s%> them <S%G846><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> their <S%G846><s%> heart. <S%G2588><s%> <S%G2532><s%> I will be <S%G2071><s%> their <S%G846><s%> <S%G1519><s%> God, <S%G2316><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> they <S%G846><s%> will be <S%G2071><s%> my <S%G3427><s%> <S%G1519><s%> people. <S%G2992><s%>

They will <S%G1321><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> <S%G3361><s%> teach <S%G1321><s%> every man <S%G1538><s%> his <S%G846><s%> fellow citizen, <S%G4139><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> every man <S%G1538><s%> his <S%G846><s%> brother, <S%G80><s%> saying, <S%G3004><s%> <S%G1097><s%> 'Know the Lord, <S%G2962><s%>' for <S%G3754><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> will know <S%G1492><s%> me, <S%G3165><s%> <S%G846><s%> from <S%G575><s%> their least <S%G3398><s%> to <S%G2193><s%> their <S%G846><s%> greatest. <S%G846><s%>

For <S%G3754><s%> I will be <S%G2071><s%> merciful <S%G2436><s%> to <S%G93><s%> their <S%G846><s%> unrighteousness. <S%G93><s%> <S%G2532><s%> I will remember <S%G3415><s%> their <S%G846><s%> sins <S%G266><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> <S%G846><s%> lawless deeds <S%G458><s%> no <S%G3756><s%> <S%G3361><s%> more. <S%G2089><s%>"

In <S%G1722><s%> that he says, <S%G3004><s%> "A new <S%G2537><s%> covenant, <S%G3822><s%>" he has made the first <S%G4413><s%> old. <S%G3822><s%> But <S%G1161><s%> that which is becoming old <S%G3822><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> grows aged <S%G1095><s%> is near <S%G1451><s%> to vanishing away. <S%G854><s%>
